alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:50AM EDT until April 01 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Monroe County in southeastern Michigan... Eastern Lenawee County in southeastern Michigan... Southern Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 1250 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tecumseh, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Milan and Dundee around 100 AM EDT. Maybee and Willis around 105 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Azalia, Cone, Whittaker, Macon, Riga, Oakville, Bridgewater, Ridgeway and Pleasant Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
